item.title: JJ Lin - Bedroom (Feat.Anne-Marie)
item.description:
Woo why
you look so sad?
I’ve never seen
you look so bad
You used to be the
strongest of us two
Now look at you
sitting there
Woo no one’s
picking up the phone
The party’s over
and you’re all alone
I used to give a fxxx
‘bout me and you
Now I look at you
and I don’t care
You’re crying
in your bedroom
Cos I’ve gone
and left you
Wish I never
met you
Don’t know
what you’ve got
Until
it’s gone
You’re crying
in your bedroom
Easy to forget you
done this to yourself
And now I’m gone
now I’m celebrating
My God
I bet you hate it
I can’t
believe
I waited for you
for so long
You’re crying
in your bedroom
Cos I’ve gone
and left you
Don’t know
what you’ve got
Until
it’s gone gone
